name: Quiz Quartet
description:
* Prototype *

Experimental development version. Please let me know what you think in the discussion board below.

  • 1-4 player local multiplayer triva game.
  • 11 categories: History / Science / Nature / Literature / Geography / Music /  TV & Cinema / Technology / Sport / Art / Food & Drink
  • Questions are engaging, educational and easy to read
  • Play on your own or in a group around the same device
  • Players can use a mix of touch screen, mouse, keyboard, or game controllers
